A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was comically bad on so many levels it is difficult to know where to begin. 

Horrible dialogue\, retread story lines\, ridiculous scenes (like Princess Leah floating in space\, Luke dusting off his shoulders\, and an absurd and unnecessary detour to a casino planet) all but rendered this film unwatchable.

After Rouge One\, the spirts of die hard life long Star Wars fans were lifted\, but the Last Jedi has all but destroyed any hope of the franchise correcting for the mistakes of the past and instead embracing them.
